attributes.action: cancel all speeding fines over 70mph on the grounds that it is the governments duty to prevent any vehicles being imported or manufactured that are capable of breaking the speeding law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government of England encourage speeding and the resulting air pollution by actively encouraging the manufacture and importation of vehicles capable of exceeding the speed limit. Therefore they are culpable and should scrap all the fines issued for this offence to date.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
